request-map.description: Verify a user is logged in.

This is an override so that the Add New action in calendar creates a production run instead of a work effort This request is actually used for both creating and showing work efforts. Will have to do something about it.
This is an override so that the WorkEffortSummary action in calendar shows a production run instead of a work effort
Checks inventory before issuing material from a single form. This uses the forceComplete behavior.
Checks inventory before issuing material from a multi form. This uses the forceComplete behavior.
